page.title: 07FARMING IN OUR GIRD AREA
page.content: Grid 7042 BLAENDDOL Owner:ELIZABETH D. JONES (widow). Land used to belong to BLAENDDOL ESTATE until 1976 when it was bought by MR. and MRS.JOHN DANIEL JONES. The farm has been handed down from mother to daughter over three generations. LAND: 100 acres. STOCK: Store cattle and 230 sheep (WELSH + SUFFOLK RAM). Mainly grazing with l985 being quite a good year. 2. LLETY FADOG Owner: PYRS ROWLANDS 100 acres of grazing land also used to rear. STOCK: 300 sheep and 50 cows. Handed down from father to son and now run by Mr.and Mrs. Rowlands. Grid 70-43 l. TY NEWYDD FFYNNON Owners: MISSES SALLY and MYFANWY HUGHES 50 acres with 8 milking cows.They rent out fields to CWMBOWYDD FARM during winter.Family here 2-300 years. NOTE* Last farm on p. 8
